price: Na amri yetu haikuwa ila ni moja tu, kama kupepesa jicho.
arabic: وَمَآ أَمۡرُنَآ إِلَّا وَٰحِدَةٞ كَلَمۡحِۭ بِٱلۡبَصَرِ
footnotes: Na haikuwa amri yetu tukitaka kitu ila neno moja tu, nalo ni kusema: "Kuwa", nacho huwa, papo hapo kama kupepesa kwa jicho.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamā amrunā illā wāḥidatun kalamḥin bil-baṣari
